scripts.build-apply: spicetify-creator --out=dist --minify && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass "$dest=Join-Path $env:APPDATA 'spicetify/Extensions'; if(-not (Test-Path $dest)){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $dest | Out-Null }; Copy-Item -Force (Join-Path 'dist' 'cat-jam.js') (Join-Path $dest 'cat-jam.js')" && spicetify apply
